name: Snekk (SqueakyHands)
description:
You're all alone, you're hungry, and you're snekk.

You will devour the world!

A world of old houses and dust. Will you be able to settle your hunger?
Use the arrows on the keyboard to steer your way towards anything editable.

This is not a finished game and therefore may contain (possibly game breaking) bugs. We hope you enjoy.

Made for Global Game Jam 2020 (Unofficially) ( https://globalgamejam.org/ ) January 2020.

Participants

  • Joakim Westgren
  • Oscar Andersson
  • Rasmus Tilljander
  • Simon Hyltegård
  • Tobias Johansson
